lines.text: Maybe this isn't a real dead body, and it's just... a <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone</c> statue that LOOKS like a dead body?
Not like we'd be able to tell, since we can't touch anything to see if it's hard as a rock.
Yeah. You think a statue's gonna smell like burning flesh?
...You give the dead body a kick.
Just checking! Didn't stub my toe- guy's definitely a real body.
D-don't do that again! That's a serious violation of p-protocol!
She's right. You better watch it- unless you want some more time on your parole.
Hm... not sure if the statue theory's totally disproven yet...
You pull back a leg to kick the body...
Don't even think about it, Seeker.
